title: training all layers get lower mAP
body:
## ‚ùîQuestion
First of all, thank the author for sharing the quality code.
In my training process, I found that the effect of training all layer weights is a little bit worse than that of  only training predictor, especially small objects.
I wonder at this phenomenon. I think that I should get better results if I training all layers.

## Additional context
train_dataset: PASCAL VOC2012 train.txt
val_dataset: PASCAL VOC2012 val.txt
training epoch: 20
training initial lr: 0.001
end lr: 0.00001

if I only training predictor using --freeze-layers parameter, i got results as follows:
```
 Average Precision  (AP) @[ IoU=0.50:0.95 | area=   all | maxDets=100 ] = 0.583
 Average Precision  (AP) @[ IoU=0.50      | area=   all | maxDets=100 ] = 0.809
 Average Precision  (AP) @[ IoU=0.75      | area=   all | maxDets=100 ] = 0.645
 Average Precision  (AP) @[ IoU=0.50:0.95 | area= small | maxDets=100 ] = 0.199
 Average Precision  (AP) @[ IoU=0.50:0.95 | area=medium | maxDets=100 ] = 0.463
 Average Precision  (AP) @[ IoU=0.50:0.95 | area= large | maxDets=100 ] = 0.665
 Average Recall     (AR) @[ IoU=0.50:0.95 | area=   all | maxDets=  1 ] = 0.463
 Average Recall     (AR) @[ IoU=0.50:0.95 | area=   all | maxDets= 10 ] = 0.691
 Average Recall     (AR) @[ IoU=0.50:0.95 | area=   all | maxDets=100 ] = 0.716
 Average Recall     (AR) @[ IoU=0.50:0.95 | area= small | maxDets=100 ] = 0.383
 Average Recall     (AR) @[ IoU=0.50:0.95 | area=medium | maxDets=100 ] = 0.621
 Average Recall     (AR) @[ IoU=0.50:0.95 | area= large | maxDets=100 ] = 0.776
```

if I training all layers, i got results as follows:
```
 Average Precision  (AP) @[ IoU=0.50:0.95 | area=   all | maxDets=100 ] = 0.582
 Average Precision  (AP) @[ IoU=0.50      | area=   all | maxDets=100 ] = 0.806
 Average Precision  (AP) @[ IoU=0.75      | area=   all | maxDets=100 ] = 0.643
 Average Precision  (AP) @[ IoU=0.50:0.95 | area= small | maxDets=100 ] = 0.185
 Average Precision  (AP) @[ IoU=0.50:0.95 | area=medium | maxDets=100 ] = 0.446
 Average Precision  (AP) @[ IoU=0.50:0.95 | area= large | maxDets=100 ] = 0.674
 Average Recall     (AR) @[ IoU=0.50:0.95 | area=   all | maxDets=  1 ] = 0.470
 Average Recall     (AR) @[ IoU=0.50:0.95 | area=   all | maxDets= 10 ] = 0.683
 Average Recall     (AR) @[ IoU=0.50:0.95 | area=   all | maxDets=100 ] = 0.702
 Average Recall     (AR) @[ IoU=0.50:0.95 | area= small | maxDets=100 ] = 0.366
 Average Recall     (AR) @[ IoU=0.50:0.95 | area=medium | maxDets=100 ] = 0.592
 Average Recall     (AR) @[ IoU=0.50:0.95 | area= large | maxDets=100 ] = 0.767
```

Could you provide some methods or tips to improve accuracy when i train all layers? Looking forward to your reply soon!
